review: So far I love it.  I was connecting via a cable and my computer before.  That was too cumbersome and annoying.  Now with the fire stick, I can watch NetFlix and Amazon in an instant.  I have yet to try all the features.  But when I get a chance, I'm sure it will be awesome as well.
author: Tevonda Hayes

review: Great product, fast, crisp, no lag time. Simple setup anyone can do it. I love this thing!!!!!!!
author: Kenneth E Higgs

review: I thought it was suppose to mirror your kindle.  It does not.  the Firestick comes with a three foot power cord the plugs into it.  I did had not seen any pictures or descriptions of this on commercials or on website.  It really does not do that much more than my blueray player.
author: John

review: My son bought this and is very Happy with it.
author: Bev

review: Gave this to my daughter who lives next door and doesn't have cable.  She loves to watch TV series.  With the tv stick logged in to my wireless network she gets superior audio and video on her 42 in HDTV an home theater system.  Setup was a snap and the menu was easy to follow to make changes.  Best 39 dollars I ever spent on entertainment electronics.
author: K.  Bassett

review: I didn't think I'd find something I like more than the Chromecast. This is WAY better. As a Plex user, I like that I don't have to have my phone or tablet to power it. The user interface is much more pleasing and some of the other apps are great.
author: J. Nickel

review: So happy to now get Amazon Prime on my TV as my blue ray device doesn't get it!  Works quickly and efficiently.  Easy to browse movies.  Using it for Amazon Prime and Netflix.
author: jcrack

review: Just plug it in and connect to wi fi and you are ready to watch many movies and TV programs
author: Danny c
